plot: The Golem, a giant creature created out of clay by a rabbi, comes to life in a time of trouble to protect the Jews of Prague from persecution.
title: Le golem
plot_es: The Golem, a giant creature created out of clay by a rabbi, comes to life in a time of trouble to protect the Jews of Prague from persecution.
plot_en: The Golem, a giant creature created out of clay by a rabbi, comes to life in a time of trouble to protect the Jews of Prague from persecution.

cast.role: L'empereur Rodolphe II, roi de Bohème
cast.name: Harry Baur

cast.role: Friedrich, le chef de la police
cast.name: Gaston Jacquet
